_header: For Scots / Tell I for sots
Note:
See 5618 for Brut version; cf. Fabyan’s Chronicle, ed.Ellis (1811)
XEllis, Sir Henry. The New Chronicles of England and France in Two Parts. repr. of Robert Fabyan, New Chronicles, Pynson 1516 (STC 10659). London: Rivington, 1811, 398.
Subjects: chronicles, verse in; Scots, songs against; historical poems; songs, soldiers’
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, Lambeth Palace Library 131: not in this MS.
_description: A song of victory over the Scots inserted in Peter Langtoft’s Chronicle — one 6-line stanza

OxfAllS39.Transcription:
ffor scottestelle I for sottes and wreches vn wareVnselle
                    dentes to dele þaym drogh to sunbare

                    selediutes to deleþaim drohg to dunbarre

                    verse lines per line of M.

Several verse lines per manuscript line. Peter Langtoft’s
                        Chronicle.
